verbose_text: We analyzed the molecular determinants downstream of AKT signaling in cells expressing SLC3A1 or depleted of SLC3A1 to determine the role of SLC3A1 / AKT signaling in tumorigenesis, Figure XREF_FIG G shows that SLC3A1 overexpression promoted the beta-catenin accumulation and the expression of one of its target genes, c-myc, which is an important oncogene driving tumorigenesis.
